Name: PackunPetit
Notes: A plant enemy that tries to bite the player if they are nearby. It can be defeated through all of the player's attacks as well as some enemy attacks. Once defeated, it will either drop a Coin or three Star Bits depending on how it was defeated.

Obj_arg0.Name: Doesn't Turn?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it won't turn around.

Obj_arg7.Name: Use Collision Binder?
Obj_arg7.Description: If set, it will use a collision binder which makes it react to collision. Furthermore, it will also react to gravity instead of being in a locked position.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated when it dies. It won't drop any items when killed, however.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

ScoreAttack.Description: This object scores 100 points in The Chimp's challenges.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and pulled by Yoshi.
